This edition includes all of the Special Edition content, including the ability to play as Vergil, and even includes extra bonus features exclusive to the Nintendo Switch, such as "Free Style mode," which enables you to switch freely between fighting styles; the abilty to switch between all unlocked weapons at any time; and finally, play "Bloody Palace mode" in local co-op.

name: Tom and Jerry
description:
Talk about playing cat and mouse! Tom and Jerry, that rascally pair of cartoon characters who first started their careers in the 1940s, have chased each other onto the screen of the Game Boy Color. You play Jerry, on the lookout for nephew Tuffy, who's coming to visit you. Lurking around, of course, is Tom, who would just love to sink his sharp fangs into a mouse morsel. You must try to find Tuffy before Tom does--and before Tom finds you. You'll explore 10 different levels, such as Street and Rooftops, in four distinct worlds.

There are bonus areas to each level in Tom and Jerry, so be sure to look out for those too while searching for Tuffy. Sprinkled throughout the levels are numerous power-ups (yum... cheese!) that add to your overall score, as well as an optional card-match game between each level that can mean extra points too. Also, the game trumpets the original Tom and Jerry theme song while you play.

name: Devil May Cry Triple Pack
description:
Includes Devil May Cry 1, 2, and 3 Special Edition.

Devil May Cry 3 Special Edition contains Switch exclusive features with "Free Style mode," which allows players to use all unlocked weapons at any time with a newly added radial menu, and to switch between combat styles mid-combat. Bloody Palace mode also has a new local co-op feature.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Vault Edition
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that features the return of the iconic Operators of Task Force 141. Available on all platforms, the digital-only Vault Edition offers the most content of any version of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II.

In addition to the base game – Cross-Gen Bundle version on consoles, Standard Edition on PC – and Early Access to the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II Open Beta*, the Vault Edition includes the following bonus content:

- Red Team 141 Operator Pack: includes four playable Multiplayer Operators: Ghost, Farah, Price, and Soap. Each Operator comes equipped with a custom-made masked outfit themed around the legendary mercenary Ghost.
- FJX Cinder Weapon Vault
- One season of the Battle Pass and 50 Tier Skips (or its equivalent) at launch.
- Ghost Legacy Pack: Instantly unlock 12 Operator Skins for the Ghost Operator and 10 Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprints for use in Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019).
- Players who purchase the Vault Edition through the in-game store in Call of Duty: Warzone, Call of Duty: Vanguard, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War, or Call of Duty: Modern Warfare will receive 10 hours of Double XP Tokens and 10 hours of Double Weapon XP Tokens for use in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II. XP Tokens will be waiting for you and available to use in-game at launch.

name: Dice Versa
description:
Dice Versa is a logic game inspired by Uno, Dominoes and Tetris. It’s deceptively simple to play:

Drag dice onto the board.
Complete rows and columns to score points.
Adjacent dice must have the same color or value.

Putt your way through short little mini golf courses with the relaxing soundtrack in the background. Whether you want a casual game to play in long game queues, or simply want a relaxing way to pass the time Pastel Putter's chill vibe is perfect for you.

Borrow and apply functions to clear the way to the star
Three different characters, 14 types of cells, 100 levels are waiting for you

name: Oscarzinho e o Bug do Esporte
description:
Oscarzinho e o Bug do Esporte is a kids' adventure game where Oscarzinho, based on the Brazilian basketball player Oscar Schmidt, and his friends need to deal with a group named Drugs that have infested the planet with a computer virus and wiped out all memory of sports and to revert this situation, they will challenge the Drugs until they manage to make all sports practiced again.

The game aims to encourage the practice of sports, teach citizenship notions, show the dangers of drug use, and develop the player's creative potential and motor coordination.

name: Jump Squad
description: Collect coins, bop enemies’ heads, and leap over mushrooms in Jump Squad, a fun and cute casual game. Enjoy its easy-to-learn gameplay as you journey through different areas, jumping and spinning with your own personalized squad of cats and dogs! Once you’ve had enough of jumping, why not raise the stakes for more coins by playing the Higher or Lower mini-game? Who knows, your squad could be millionaires in no time!

name: Hidden Object: Mystery Place

If you like solving mystery cases, you're at the right place! Be ready to face the real challenge of finding hidden objects and give a complete home makeover to mystery places.

App Invent presents another wonderful free offline hidden object game. Our unique story offers you a chance to find objects and enjoy the wonders of the mystery places! All you need to do is concentrate on the objects listed and find a hidden object from beautiful scenes.

The game is a classic "find the object game", which is both educational and fun! By playing it, you can advance your vocabulary and have a lot of fun!

"Search and find objects" in mystery places and invite mystery into your world! Continue your investigation to one more mystery in the Game! If you like the mystery world's environment and are ready to discover secrets in the house.

name: Puzzle Club
description:
Puzzle Club is a cancelled puzzle arcade game developed by Namco in 1990. While it never has received any form of official release, the game's prototype ROM was dumped and is playable in emulators.

The game is very akin to slide puzzles, however the player must link the matching tiles into a horizontal row, as opposed to completing an image. Once a row has been completed, the blocks will turn to bricks, and cannot be moved. Two modes are present in the game - "Pacman Story" and "Floor Exercise" - with Pac-Man only appearing in the former.

Pacman Story features the Pac-Land incarnations of various characters, fully animated, as the tilepieces. Upon completing a level it shows an intermission, featuring a zoomed-in Pac-Man character that is identical to the regular tile(s). After thirty levels, the game ends, displaying the credits. The Floor Exercise mode is incomplete and impossible to finish; instead of Pac-Man tiles, it features generic slot machine graphics. In place of Pacman Story's intermissions, Floor Exercise also has bonus rounds, featuring a large puzzle of a girl lifting weights.

Take control of your parallel selves on a mission to save the dying multiverse in this rogue-lite action platformer! Explore dark, sci-fi worlds and engage in fast-paced, smooth and precise combat.

The various branches of the multiverse are always changing. Fight through a combination of procedurally-generated levels as well as hand-crafted challenges and arenas that will put your skills to the test. Levels with 3D graphics are seamlessly constructed out of hundreds of hand-made rooms.

With weapons and attack systems that leverage our previous experience working on fighting games. You’ll slide, dash and dodge between enemy attacks and strike back with an arsenal of satisfying special weapons and abilities.

Each of your parallel selves has their own world with multiple biomes to explore, as well as their own sets of unique abilities and weapons. Travel through a universe of desolate wastes and caverns roamed by mutant creatures, escape the endless forges and labs of a world ruled by machines, and survive the dangerous sky cities of a post-human society.

name: Enotria: The Last Song
description: Enotria: The Last Song is a soulslike set in a beautiful sun-lit world inspired by Italian folklore where the brightest sun casts the darkest shadow. Wear unique role-altering masks, face formidable foes and alter reality with the power of Ardore to unravel the secrets of Enotria.

name: It Was a Human
description: A short SF psychedelic interrogation ADV game that focuses on the interrogation of a suspect in a dismemberment murder case. The protagonist is a lieutenant colonel, tasked with interrogating the suspect. The protagonist needs to find out why she killed the two men and how she committed the crime.

name: PokéROM: Mew
description: PokéROMs were promotional shaped CD-ROMs with varying characters on the design. Each disc contained a memory game. This particular disc contained Mew on its label and had a memory game included in which the player had to find 2 of a pair of Pokemon related imagery.

name: PokéROM: Psyduck
description: This PokéROM is part of a set of educational games featuring creatures from the Pokémon universe. The game contains mathematical challenges for children up to a fifth grade level; upon completion, the player will be awarded with pictures of Psyduck. A competitive trivia mode supports up to four players in a race to the finish line. Players take turns to answer questions pertaining to such subjects as geography, grammar, and Pokémon knowledge, with correct answers moving the player closer to the goal.

name: Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai Yaarahen de!! Zettai ni Tsukamatte ha Ikenai Gas Kurobikari Land
description: Fight to survive from the batsu dealing Oni and complete more objectives than the other Gaki members.

name: Genderfelt
description: genderfelt is a short interactive zine, in which you read the blog of young person called Anon, going through the process of discovering himself. It focuses on the issue of transmedicalism, and how one can help to pull their peers away from a harmful ideology.

name: Alpaca Evolution
description:
In a sunny merry meadow village, where a herd of alpacas live in peace and innocuously enough. Something unusual has happened. An alpaca was born mutant. He goes on the process of evolution, in his very peculiar way, by knocking out other alpaca brothers, and "absorbing" them.

You will see him no longer a cute and fluffy alpaca. Gained EXP by the "absorbing", he gets much more powerful and bigger… At a final stage of evolution, what could he mutate into? A god or a devil ? or….. It's above and beyond your imagination.

name: Maze
description: Maze (or Kai in Japanese) is a short Japanese RPG Maker 2000 Surrealistic Horror Game created by Space Debris.

name: Angry Birds Fuji TV
description: Angry Birds Fuji TV was a Japan exclusive entry in the Angry Birds series. The game featured 2 episodes, Poached Eggs and Sakura Ninja, with the Sakura Ninja episode being based in Japan.

name: Gangnam Dance School
description: Gangnam Dance School is a mobile game based around Gangnam Style.

name: Minna no Tetris
description: Minna no Tetris is a handheld plug-and-play TV game developed and published by EPOCH in Japan.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Kash Dash
description: Kash Dash is a plug and play game bundled in the Nicktoons Plug & Play.

name: Slide N' Go
description: Sin descripción

name: Old Site
description: Old Site is a mod of Celeste Classic using ideas from the chapter "Old Site" from the game's full release, Celeste.

name: Mortal Blitz: Combat Arena
description:
Occupy the battlefield with your own characters in Mortal Blitz: Combat Arena, a Free-to-Play VR FPS.

The strong elite mercenaries are joining the fights for fame and fortune in the battlefield of Combat Arena.

Enjoy the strategic multiplayer deathmatch and the revolutionary VR FPS gameplay in this vast virtual world without any limits.

name: Go to Hell
description: Just go to hell and find out it's secret in this ultimate puzzle/arcade/platform game. You have to dig all the way down through caves filled with water, lava, boulders and enemies. You can avoid suffocating and kill enemies controlling flow of water and lava by digging holes in walls of caves. You can also push a boulder on the filthy worms and bats.

name: Harry Buster
description: Harry Buster is an arcade game about stock trading.

name: Untitled
description: Untitled is a surreal 3D indie title from developer increpare.

name: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version
description: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version is the uncensored edition of the Resident Evil 2 remake exclusive to Japan. It features more graphic violence and intense gore compared to the standard Japanese version, delivering a more visceral and authentic horror experience.

name: Shooting Gallery
description:
Shooting Gallery is a simple game for DOS simulating a shooting gallery. You control mainly with the mouse to aim and try to hit targets to score points.
The game is divided into 7 rounds where each round has a different shooting game or a little bit more difficult version of a previous round.
Round 7 is always the Shootout which is a race against time to shoot as many badies as you can before the time limit runs out.

name: Biohazard Village: Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Raccoon City Edition: Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Frogger Evolution
description: Frogger Evolution is a mobile game made for the 25th anniversary of the Frogger series.

name: Isonzo: Collector's Edition
description: Ferocious Alpine warfare will test your tactical skills in this authentic WW1 FPS. Battle among the scenic peaks, rugged valleys and idyllic towns of northern Italy. The Great War on the Italian Front is brought to life and elevated to unexpected heights!

name: Potion Permit: Deluxe Edition
description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Pizza Fun
description: Pizza Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Arcade Archives: The Return of Ishtar
description: The sequel to "The Tower of Druaga" is finally here!

name: Dragon Run Classic
description: Dragon Run Classic is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your epic run as a dragon.

name: Frogger
description: The Parker Brothers port of the arcade game Frogger for the Atari 2600.

name: The Jumping Pumpkin
description: Join BIG P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Frogger
description: The Intellivision port of the arcade game Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: The ColecoVision port of the arcade game Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: The Commodore VIC-20 port of the arcade game Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: The TI-94 port of the arcade game Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: The Videopac G7000 port of the arcade game Frogger.

name: One Hell of a Ride
description: Action-packed, arcade and explosive racing game!

name: Stroke the Hamster
description:
It is small, it is cute and it is ready to be stroked. Get your own little hamster right there in your living room.

You get unlimited strokes on the little guy who will be enjoying every single one of them, so don't be afraid to keep on stroking.

Relax with your very own hamster.

name: Stroke the Hedgehog
description:
Hedgehogs are cute, that is for sure, but they are also a little spikey.

We all want to stroke one, but in reality it will leave you feeling a little damaged, here though, their spikes are nice and soft, well not really, they will still hurt.

At least you can deal with the not so real pain though.

Get stroking!

name: CubicBan
description: CubicBan is a minimalistic Sokoban-based puzzle game where you need to move the cubes to their respective places. Use the triangle block to push the square blocks to the place with square sign in it.

name: Frogger
description: Game Boy port of Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: Sin descripción

name: Frogger
description: Sin descripción

name: Feather Park
description: Explore an autumn park and play minigames. Make friends and enter the barn.

name: Frogger
description: Frogger was licensed for North American distribution by Sega-Gremlin and worldwide by Sega itself. It is regarded as a classic from the golden age of video arcade games, noted for its novel gameplay and theme.

name: Frogger
description: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Frogger
description: The port of the arcade game Frogger for the TRS-80 Color Computer.

description: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Halloween: October 31st Demake
description: Play as Michael & stalk Laurie Strode.

name: Frogger
description:
Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

The Atari 8-bit version was later ported to the Atari 5200.

name: Frogger
description:
Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

The road is full of cars and trucks, at variable speeds. The river water itself is fatal, as are the snakes which hover within on later levels. Frogger must use the arrangement of logs, turtles (which are only there for a short time) and alligators (but stay away from their faces), and then jump into one of the open home-cells, ideally one containing a fly for extra points. Once all holes have been filled, you move onto the next, harder, level.

name: Emi's Country Store and Farm
description: Play relaxed or timed in this Onet/Match 2 Game. Enjoy the nice graphics and the cute colorful tiles. Look beyond the nearest option and make every level a 3-star win. Catch the mouse while playing, earn bonus coins and create the nicest Country Store and Farm for Emi.

name: Death Corp
description: Death Corp is a classic 2D Point and Click Adventure game where you play as the young new intern for Death's own company.

name: Eat Me Alive
description: In dependency of where in the body you are positioned, you get different bonuses. In general you will get Bone, Blood and Tissue with which you can create more bugs. In addition to that you will be able to research different bug types which have bonuses themself.

name: Altar War
description: Altar War is a virtual SLG + tower defense battle game with the alternate history as the background. It achieves the hegemony of the unity of the world by upgrading cities, building appropriate buildings, upgrading arms and training generals.

name: Tekla
description: Blast your way through an endless horde of enemies in this pixel art top-down shooter. Collect their remains in order upgrade your character for increased combat abilities. Tekla is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements.

name: The Silent Huntress
description: "The Silent Huntress" is a visual novel in the genre of a dark fairy tale with choices and different endings. Not only the development of events will depend on your choices, but also the conclusions that the main character makes about her life and the world around her.

name: Fantasteroids
description: Fast-paced gameplay, rainbow colours and snappy animations all come together to give you a retro arcade-feel game with renewed graphics and avatars. There's a variety of different modes for you to choose from, and different skins to unlock and leaderboards for you to show off to your friends!

name: Lost Fleet
description: Lost Fleet is a co-op space shooter. Every ship in your fleet is flyable, from the smallest fighter to the largest battleship. Protect the Mothership, mine resources, crush your enemies.

name: Frogger
description: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Frogger
description: Your task in this arcade game is to guide a frog across a treacherous road and river, and to safety at the top of the screen. Both these sections are fraught with a variety of hazards, each of which will kill the frog and cost you a life if contact is made.

name: Darius Cozmic Collection: Consumer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Frogger
description: Timex Sinclair 1000 release port of Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: Tomy Tutor port of Frogger.

name: Frogger
description: The Timex Sinclair 2068 port of Frogger.

name: Lovely x Cation 2
description: Spring has come again and the protagonist has moved into a new home by himself after his parents transfered elsewhere for their jobs. Everyone went smoothly until he received a prediction at a shrine which he had come upon: “Go find the one who will become your partner for life. Otherwise, you will live a cruel life”. However, a non-assertive man like him didn’t know anything about love. At such an critical juncture in his life, will he be able to summon up the courage to find himself a girl?

name: Frogger
description: Frogger is a port of the original game of the same name for the mobile game and it was released on October 30, 2002 in Japanese markets and was developed and published by Konami.

name: Tomb Toad
description: Delve into dark dungeons, face fearsome foes, and ponder perilous puzzles in this topsy-turvy adventure game! To explore, simply rotate the world and let gravity do the rest.

name: Panic Diet!!
description: Panic Diet!! is a finite runner with scaling difficulty, character progression and unconventional obstacles.

name: Spear of Destiny: The Kaiseki
description:
This fantastic ancient world has been Invaded by powerful enemies who rule in the dark. Several centuries have passed since Light's Lords defeated them with the spear of destiny.

Now monsters and orcs dominate these lands with complete freedom without anyone to confront them. Only a remnant member of the Light's Lords believes in this ancient story, he travels through different places in search the legendary spear of destiny.

To liberty again this world of powerful enemies as their yours ancestors did several centuries ago. The great and eternal epic battle begins.

name: Rival Pirates
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Make 'em walk the plank! Set sail, fire cannon balls and be the last boat standing among your enemies in this swashbuckling adventure.

Do you have what it takes to rule the seven seas?

It's a multiplayer battle royale. Choose two crew members and a trusty ship, then prepare for battle with players from around the world. Use cannon fire and special abilities to send your enemies to the bottom of the ocean.

Be the last ship left sailing to win! Up to 16 players can join the skirmish. Keep your ship from being destroyed to avoid elimination, and make your enemies suffer.

In between battles, upgrade your crew and ship and unlock new lands to explore.

From Amuzo Games and Rogue Games.

name: Folds of a Separation
description: Folds of a Separation is a short rumination on a state's control over bodies and the grief that stems from carceral violence.

name: The Bombs Have Been Dropped, I am Listening to Steely Dan and Wearing Cheap Sunglasses.
description: A visual novel about talking to cute girls during the nuclear holocaust.

name: Mountain Climber: Frozen Dream
description:
Run, jump and climb as you avoid lethal obstacles to reach the summit!

Face numerous challenges in this exciting platformer as you help Sammy fulfill his dream of getting to the top and becoming a climber!

Mountain Climber: Frozen Dream is a platform game with superb 8-bit aesthetics and a touching story of self-improvement. A challenging game where every death is a lesson learned. Nobody ever said that climbing a mountain would be easy!

name: Frogger
description: A remake of Frogger for mobile devices.

name: Blueprints
description:
Blueprints is a 3D third-person parkour platformer game where the more levels you beat, the prettier they get.
Experience beautiful natural (and not natural) landscapes in this short casual adventure you are very likely to forget.
Play all sorts of parkour challenges (and a random 2 minutes of holding [W]) in this 3-hour adventure of a lifetime.
It's not quite an adventure of a lifetime, but still a good adventure.

name: Burial
description: Suddenly, Kai realizes that he is standing in front of someone's tombstone in the cemetery. He can't remember anything about how he got there, and just as he decides to leave, he sees a girl running through the cemetery, pursued by a ghost with a sword. Trying to help the girl, Kai takes refuge with her in a nearby church, but the ghost continues to pursue them. The fugitives have no choice but to descend into the church's ancient catacombs and hope that they can find another way out...

name: X-Men: The Official Game
description:
X-Men: The Official Game is positioned between the second and third X-Men movies. This particular version differs significantly from its computer and console counterparts. It adopts a top-down action game format featuring 3D characters across forty levels. During gameplay, the player can seamlessly switch between Wolverine, Iceman, and Magneto in certain levels, while others focus on controlling Nightcrawler exclusively. Character movement is facilitated through the Control Pad, while all other character actions are executed via the touch screen. The lower screen serves as the gameplay area, displaying the characters, while the upper screen provides information on their status.

Nightcrawler possesses teleportation abilities, Wolverine excels in ground-based attacks, Iceman specializes in shooting ice attacks, and Magneto can manipulate metallic objects, including picking them up and throwing them. Magneto is also capable of breaking metal doors. Each character's attacks have varying effectiveness against enemies, making it essential for the player to switch between characters to defeat them frequently. In addition to the standard enemies, many levels also feature formidable boss characters.

name: Safety: Life Is A Maze
description: A action/adventure game revolving around Mina, and her friends, as she tries to escape her mysterious captivity.

name: The Dark Conjunction
description: The Dark Conjunction is a Single-Player Total Conversion for Quake 3: Arena that is inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Generations Arena
description: Generations Arena is the "ultimate tribute" to ID Software, as it combines play styles and characters from all games previous to Quake III's release, such as Doom, Wolfenstein, and both Quake 1 and , combining them all into one giant multiplayer mod that pits characters from all those games in Quake III style arenas.

name: Navy SEALs: Covert Operations
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Cult Tycoon 2 Deluxe Edition
description: The game’s set in a small Colorado town, and basically has you driving around recruiting the townsfolk, putting them to work, raising cash and ultimately getting enough gear together for your cult’s mothership to arrive and whisk you all off to a better place.

name: Deer-Napped
description: The player is a ninja working for Santa and must rescue his reindeer from the Abominable Snowpeople.

name: Terror in Christmas Town
description: The player must find a captured elf who has been frozen by the evil Polar bear king. You must survive the journey past the roaming bears and enter the castle holding the frozen elf.

name: A Bomb Called Darkipt
description: The third game released by Gretchen, also known as BrownSugar, creator of both A Vague Story and Patty & Mr. Miles in Wolf RPG Editor.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 1: X-Treme Beach Volleyball
description: The first in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 2: X-Treme Beach Soccer
description: The second in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Babes & Balls Vol. 3: Gotcha Babes X-Treme
description: The third and final in a series of adult sports games by Redfire Software.

name: Last Kiss Before Summer
description: An unknown illness has gripped you since birth, stranding you indoors most of your life. Despite this, you've spent your days happily learning about the world around you. But recently, your illness has progressed rapidly, leaving you with only 33 days left to live! Determined to make the most of your time, you enroll in school and seek out experiences you’ve never had before—like love. Will your last days be as blissful as you’d hoped?

name: I'm the Master of 3 Cute Maids
description: You're a perpetual job-hopper with no real future… until you save an old man from a group of delinquents. As thanks, he offers you a ridiculous reward—a gigantic mansion with three maids ready to serve you! However, in order to become the ‘true owner,’ you must prove yourself worthy within a month’s time. You quickly accept the challenge... How hard could it be to own a mansion?

name: The Chronicles of Myrtana: Archolos
description:
The Chronicles Of Myrtana: Archolos is a free, total conversion mod for Gothic II: Gold Edition. It features a completely new open world, improved skills systems, gameplay mechanics and complex story.

Main goal of this project is to honour one the best classic cRPG and take the die-hard fans of the original Gothic trilogy as well as new players on one more adventure in the Kingdom of Myrtana.

name: Desi Adda: Games of India
description: Desi Adda consists of a collection of cultural games from India, based on traditional Indian sports. These include Kite Fighting, Kabaddi, Pachisi, Bagh-Chal and Gilli-Danda. The player is placed in an Indian village, where they can play the different games with other villagers and converse with them. The player will learn from the villagers of a couple in love, and must interact with different villagers in order to progress the story. An additional beat-matching dance game is unlocked by completing the story. The game is in four languages: English, Hindi, Tamil and Punjabi.

name: CubeShot
description: CubeShot is a fascinating first-person multiplayer shooter game with block graphics, in which you will enter a battlefield full of ruthless players. This free online game on offers you spectacular duels against other players, in the middle of a war zone to put your killer instinct to the test.

name: Pico World Race
description: Pico World Race is a fast-paced racing game for PICO-8. Get in your supercar and take a trip around the world, testing your driving skills on challenging circuits against a host of opponents.

name: Celtic Village
description: Celtic village is a management game where you have to do everything to keep all your villagers alive while developing your village.

name: Sword of Moonlight King's Field Making tool
description: The user can make his own role-playing game using this 3D RPG making tool. It includes various useful tools to create a King's Field-like game. The remake of the original King's Field is also included as a customizable sample.

name: Astral Guard
description: Astral Guard is an interplanetary RPG adventure following a group of aliens trying to stop a vicious hivemind from taking over the solar system. Find friends, fight foes, and travel the stars!

name: Anniversary no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
description: Anniversary no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful Wonder World~ is a remake of Heart no Kuni no Alice featuring redrawn CGs and new character routes. It was originally released on March 2010 for PC and a version for PSP was released on July 2011.

name: Heart no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Twin World
description: Wonderful Twin World is a continuation of "Heart no Kuni no Alice", and its fandisc.

name: Kanuchi: Shiroki Tsubasa no Shou
description: An otome PS2 game.

name: BipBop
description: Bipbop is a a breakout clone with a sinister twist.

name: BipBop III
description: The ending to the Bipbop trilogy. It concludes the thrilling story.

name: Kanuchi: Kuroki Tsubasa no Shou
description: A sequel to Kanuchi: Shiroki Tsubasa no Shou.

name: Road & Car: Test Drive III - The Passion: Add-On Disk 1
description: This add-on to Test Drive III lets you drive the Acura NSX and Dodge Stealth RT Turbo, in New England territory including Cape Cod and Niagra Falls.

name: Corridor 8: Galactic Wars
description:
Corridor 8: Galactic Wars was the planned sequel to Corridor 7, a first-person shooter by Capstone Software. The sequel used the Build engine and was supposed to be released in early 1997. However, Capstone and its parent company Intracorp Entertainment went bankrupt in 1996. One of the former developers published an early prototype including the source code and a design document of this game.

According to the document, Corridor 8 was planned to have 6 episodes with 10 maps each. The episodes were broken up into two sides: the human "Allied" and the alien "Axis", three episodes for each side. This game was also supposed to feature 18 characters plus 6 aliens redone from Corridor 7, 20 weapons to choose from and a secret weapon, and multi-player network gaming for up to 8 players.

name: Max Payne@University
description: "Max Payne@University" follows a young Max Payne during his time at university. One year there is a dangerous threat to the university that escalates drastically very quickly.

name: Matrixed Reality
description: A modification of Max Payne that recreates scenes from the first three Matrix films.

name: The Real World
description: The creators of ‘MAX PAYNE: Kung Fu Edition 3’ and ‘Katana’ join forces to deliver THE most explosive and complete mod to ever grace the Max Payne engine! Combine a massive arsenal of lightning-fast punches, kicks, and cool signature takedown moves to devastate your opponents with style! Run along walls, dodge bullets effortlessly, and flip off walls, objects and even people! The rules are yours to bend and break, as you relive some of the Trilogy's most memorable scenes, including The Lobby, Dojo, and The Burly Brawl!

name: The Family
description: "The Family" follows the young gangster Tony in an entire black and white film noir-ish world of the 1930's mafia era.

name: Back to School: My Worst Day
description: Personal survival story loosely based on real events set in western Ukraine.

name: True Matrix Total Conversion
description: The True Matrix TC for Max Payne converts this popular game into The Matrix, complete with new weapons, characters, and music from the hit film.

name: Out of Hell
description: A single player experience for Unreal Tournament 2004. Make your way through a decimated town overrun by blood-thirsty zombies! Powerful firearms and brutal melee weapons are at your disposal as you cut and cleave through over 20 grimy and blood-soaked maps!

name: Sonic Mega Collection Plus Mini
description: Sonic Mega Collection Plus Mini was an online Flash game made to promote Sonic Mega Collection Plus. The game is playable from Sonic Mega Collection Plus and is a miniature version of Sonic Mega Collection, with only a slightly altered version of Green Hill Zone from Sonic the Hedgehog playable.

name: My Angel Girlfriend
description:
You’re just a typical high school student. You’ve got good friends. You’ve got good grades. Everything in your life is going well. But you can’t help but feel empty. Surely there’s got to be more to life than this? If you only had a sign! Well, your prayers are answered when you encounter a stunning girl mysteriously standing in the middle of the street. She tells you that she’s looking for an angel… You immediately realize that this girl is delusional and that this isn’t the kind of change you were looking for in your life. You head home. So much for that.

Suddenly, you hear someone tapping on your window. It’s that girl from before… But HOLY COW! She’s got beautiful angel wings and is flying outside your window! She’s actually a real angel! Now that she’s got your attention, she explains that she needs help finding her sister, a fallen angel. Not having a clue as to what on earth or heaven is going on, you agree to let her stay with you, only to wake up the next morning to find yet another gorgeous angel in your room. If there is a God, he must really like you!

Before you know it, the two angel girls have joined your school, and you’re helping them look for this ”fallen angel.” But, you soon learn that angels aren’t the only unearthly beings hiding in your school. Powerful devils looking to cause trouble are lurking about too! Can you help these two angel beauties save this fallen angel and foil the devils’ plot before all hell breaks loose? Don’t wait for a sign from heaven.

name: Love Live! School Idol Festival 2: Miracle Live!
description: Curtain has been raised once again for the School Idol Festival and strongly aimed by μ’s, Aqours, Nijigasaki School Idol Club, and Liella!

name: Watch Your Plastic Duck
description:
Small rubber ducks calmly swim in the pool and you can watch them to relaxing music. What can go wrong?
Watch Your Plastic Duck is an idle game where you just relax and watch the ducks in the pool.

name: CyberHeroes Arena
description: CyberHeroes Arena is an autobattle roguelite. Choose your cyber hero, create your build and destroy all cyber monsters to survive.

name: Coalescence
description: Coalescence is a visual novel that takes you deep within Moniker Labs to explore its secrets. Play as one of three characters, each with their own storyline and dialogue options. Form relationships with the companions you encounter and try to make it out alive!

name: Heroes of Hellas Origins: Part Two
description: With Hellas captured by evil, it is in desperate need of saving. Join Hades in this match-three puzzle game to transform the stone wasteland into a realm of justice and rid the people’s hearts of evil. Become the hero that saves Hellas!

name: Fried Panic
description: Survive as long as possible in Fried Panic! Buy weapons, abilities, and even donut producing machines. Fight through waves of eggs, lemons, chicken drumsticks, and much more, all in a top down pixel art style.

name: Fisher's Qualm
description: ASMR based casual island fishing game!

name: Panda Roll
description: With a puzzle mechanic controlling both heroes at the same time, guide Pandara and Mulatta on an adventure of challenges and friendship, to find the mighty Sun Bamboo, and cure the Mulatta's mother.

name: QuentBlast
description: QuentBlast is a cool indie RPG, where you bowl to attack! In this thrilling game of chance, the renowned Dr. Quent Blast has taken you on as his apprentice. As he shows you the art and science behind bowling, enjoy snappy, witty dialogue.

name: The Others
description: The toy factory is closed. Mysterious things are happening. Mary Bingham knows why in The Others, a creepy hidden object mystery that calls on your imagination in unique ways as you put the pieces of this ominous story together.

name: Spooked Hide & Seek
description: Spooked is a crazy hide & seek game in a huge magical castle with up to 10 hiders playing against one dangerous seeker. Maybe you will be sneaky enough to complete all the tasks and get out of the mysterious castle or enough determined to hunt everyone else down

name: The Door Project
description: Set up in a beautiful little town, you will have to investigate the mysterious disappearance of your friend and his community. Based on a high interactivity with the world, be prepared to use your brain and the tools around you for this unique first person adventure!

name: Chronique des Silencieux
description: Set in 1970s southern France, you play a rookie private eye tasked to dig out the secrets of a stubborn old man. Think on your feet while you follow your leads : ask questions to witnesses, detect their lies, hypothesize why and finally confront the silent ones running from their past.

name: Rikua
description: Rikua is a 2.5D action platformer ninja cyberpunk game surrounded in beautiful, realistic and futuristic 3D aesthetics, and introduces a unique hack-and-slash/third-person-shooting mechanics that will keep you constantly on the edge!

name: Broilers
description: Broilers is a turn-based game that resembles chess and similar board games, but only externally. The basis of almost all of the mechanics in Broilers, is selection (breeding). Learn how to breed new species and their characteristics in order to win the online challenge.

name: This Bed We Made
description: This Bed We Made is a third-person mystery game in which you play as a maid in a 1950s hotel and snoop around strangers' rooms to uncover their deadly secrets. Discover what links the clients together in this tale of love, heartbreak and murder!

name: Detective Stories
description: You are a detective who has to solve mystery and cold cases. Only a few clues will help finding murderer. Was it just an accident or a murder? Thief broke in to steal something? Money? Or was it just a broken heart revenge? Well, you`ve got a chance to solve this case...

name: The Lost Bloodline
description: The Lost Bloodline is a game where you will venture into an immersive story developed in medieval times, endowed with a lot of action, exploration and a touch of fantasy, we recommend you to venture into this great epic journey.

name: Snow Plowing Simulator
description: Nobody likes winter when they get up in the morning and have to clear snow in the entire neighborhood. What if we tell you that clearing snow can be relaxing? Just real snow chill! PS. Persistent ones will learn about the fascinating history of a sleepy town lost somewhere in the high mountains...

name: Paperplanes
description: A Third Person Action Adventure game where you explore the conflicted land of contemporary India in a post climate change crisis as an eighteen year old Hope.

name: El Dorado: The Golden City Builder
description: El Dorado The Golden City Builder is a single-player city-building economic strategy game that is set in the mysterious land of pre-Columbian Latin America, where wealth does not always lead to happiness, and the anger of the Gods can bring disaster to anyone who is not favorable to them.

name: Dungeon Knight
description: A fun and simple pixel platforming puzzle game where you play as a small telekinetic knight, and your goal is to escape the dungeon in which you are held. Also has 30 levels and usually takes around 20 mins to an hour to complete.

name: Nanokings
description: Nanokings is a rogue-lite infused game where you try to survive the onslaught of evolved beasts and viking tribes augmented by steampunk machinery. Increase your power by collecting mysterious powders that allow you to choose items or upgrades in the norse dystopia of Myrkrafjordur.

name: Cathedral of Sorrow
description: Enter an evolving, procedural nightmare: Once a sanctuary for the bereaved, now a labyrinth of the lost - the Cathedral is a horror game run by an AI-model trained on human fear. Traverse its depths; evade its terrors; and free its captive souls in a non-linear and character driven game.

name: Ink Inside
description: INK INSIDE is the hand drawn beat-em-up RPG with the heart of a Saturday Morning Cartoon! Play as Stick (Brian David Gilbert) an unfinished doodle in an old notebook trying to discover who they are. Fight back against the wet "Sog" corrupting the world while saving your friends in co-op!

name: Dismantled 2
description: Dismantled 2 is a survival horror game, and is the sequel to Dismantled. The game will see new characters involved in the story, 4 years after the events of the first game.

name: Supermarket Manager
description: Supermarket Manager: Lead, manage, develop, and upgrade your own stores. Choose the right products and employees. Increase your revenue to create a strong supermarket brand.

name: Dad by the Sword
description: Dad by the Sword is a First Person Swordfighting game with a heavy focus on tactical dismemberment, dynamic slicing, giant spraying fountains of purple blood, and dad jokes. Play as YOUR DAD in his quest to fight evil hot dogs, Wizzards, things hatched from eggs, and other vile Anti-Dads.

name: Curious Expedition 2 Bundle
description: This bundle includes Curious Expedition 2 + all paid DLCs, expanding possibilities across the entire game, both in Campaign Mode and Director Mode.

name: Deep Stories Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Foretales: Deluxe Edition
description: Foretales Foretales offers a unique take on the adventure genre, with a multitude of playstyles and story paths through which you can save the world… or bring about its end.

name: Steamworld Dig 2 + Steamworld Dig
description: Sin descripción

name: Beacon Pines: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Northgard: Hræsvelg, Clan of the Eagle
description: Carried by the winds, the agile explorers of Hraesvelg do not need to occupy a large territory, for they will readily venture outside to gather resources. Their profound knowledge of the terrain and their ability to exploit it to its fullest allows them to survive in the most desolate of areas.

name: Crime Moto Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Siege Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Prisonela
description: Sin descripción

name: Cruise Ships Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Chicken and Duck Brothers
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Mining Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Crab and Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: Maze of Realities: Reflection of Light - Collector's Edition
description: Where's the borderland of light and darkness? A meteorite crashes in Arizona and creates a portal to the parallel universe. Will you dare to explore foreign lands?

name: Click to Sail
description: Build a team of sailors to navigate around the world using only your mouse!

name: Cyclo Chambers
description: Collect synergizing items to create an overpowered character to fight hordes of cyclops monsters. Cyclo Chambers is a fast-paced, top-down arena shooter with light rogue-like elements. 200 items to choose from to create frantic combinations. Different runs every time.

name: The Odarian Accounts
description: Follow Cedric on his adventure as he tries to get his home and family back after events take place uprooting all that he knows, and throwing him into a world of chaos.

name: Spliced
description: Spliced is a hybrid roguelite deck-builder. Play as a symbiotic ooze, taking the parts and abilities of enemies you defeat. Use cards to battle enemies and navigate the environment.

name: Personal Chef to the Stars
description: “Personal Chef to the Stars” is a menu management simulator, Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel, and Dating Sim. Play as Chef Ayesha Rogers as she must balance the needs and desires of a household filled with eccentric celebrities while also managing her own budding love life.

name: Potato Survival
description: Potato Survival is a short story game about a character who lives alone on the open sea, collecting potatoes to survive for 21 days. By using knowledge, unlock new skills to create a more meaningful daily life! Experiencing relationships in the midst of everyday life is the objective of the game.

name: The Cat Maze
description: it is a 2d solving puzzle game, the maze is subvert your imagination, you need to find the start point and end point by yourself that to solve the cats maze. there have many type of cats have special power to help you to solve it, there have 499 level waiting for you to solve!!

name: Capsule Rush
description: Capsule Rush is a third-person 3D platformer game set in different environments. You spawn in on a platform, along the journey you'll have to traverse through many obstacles in order to reach the finish line. Compete against others for the fastest time and buckle up for the challenges waiting ahead!

name: Milita Aventuro
description: 游戏的背景是90年代的东欧国家，讲述两个虚构民族艾斯佩罗族和伊多诺族的战争，主人公是一位艾斯佩罗族的少女，玩家要操纵她在战争中游历冒险，期间会遇到各种各样的朋友和敌人。游戏由探索对话和炮弹躲避玩法，目前游戏只制作到序章部分，每制作完成一章就会进行更新。

name: Exilio
description: Discover all the secrets of the island thanks to the revelations that you will live in your dreams, in which you will have to flee from death itself and make decisions that will have consequences when you wake up, and can even cause the death of the people who cohabit with you.

name: Zombie Mansion
description: Zombie Mansion is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter with puzzle and exploration elements.

name: Red Haven
description: Navigate through the Red Haven complex and uncover secrets and survive!

name: Effigy
description: A retro FPS/metroidvania set on a prison moon overrun by a cult of former prisoners.

name: Match 3 Bundle of 3
description: Match 3 games for everyone!

name: Work from Home
description:
“Work from Home” is a co-op party game for 1 to 4 players.
Players act as workers who slack off behind their boss and pretend to work when their boss is around.
Appropriate allocation of "slacking" and "pretending to work" is the workplace survival rule in "Work from Home".
Use all the things you can reach in the workplace to slack off and have fun with colleagues.

name: Samael: The Legacy of Ophiuchus
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitchen
description:
What on earth is happening in "KITCHEN"?

An evolved survival horror, a prequel to "Resident Evil 7 Biohazard". Experience unblinking fear with unprecedented realism and immersion on PlayStationVR.

name: JoJo Siwa: Worldwide Party
description: You’re invited to JoJo Siwa’s Worldwide Party! Lace up your “High Top Shoes” and run through JoJo's worlds listening along to her biggest hits including D.R.E.AM, Bop and Nonstop! Complete levels as JoJo to perform special dance routines! Can you match t…

name: Piratepoly Gold: Caribbean Treasure
description: Ahoy Pirates! The time has come for an incredible journey. Together with the entire crew, we must conquer the whole Caribbean Sea, which is filled with valuable gold. Be vigilant because hostile units and various dangers await us on every corner.

name: Forest Pop
description: The game offers you quite a few levels to be solved. You can do so by popping mushrooms. There are different types of them and each has different and unique behaviour when tapped. Think ahead and tap with caution.

name: Hazelnut Hex
description: A strange curse falls across the land! Breakfast everywhere has disappeared, and it's up to you to save the most important meal of the day! Blast your way through 5 colorful stages jam-packed with dangerous enemies, dense bullet patterns, and ruthless bosses to rescue breakfast once and for all!

name: Kattish
description: Kattish is 2D Puzzle-Platformer Game, Our main character is a very sweet cat, But she has to pass these levels quickly. Are you ready to pass the challenging levels with plain graphics? It's not as easy as it looks.

name: FerroSlug
description:
The super-intelligent little ferrofluid, which has gained the ability to move. You will need to find your way out of the levels you are on.

Filled with puzzles with movement by squares and starring a super-intelligent ferrofluid, you must reach the finish line of each level! During the game new movement mechanics are learned, behind each level there is a window from which the scientists observe us, who will move from behind to give the sensation of being in a real laboratory.

name: S7 Mexico
description: An open world game inspired by Mexico.

name: Project X: Love Potion Disaster
description:
Project X: Love Potion Disaster is fan-erotic game based on Sonic The Hedgehog universe.
The gameplay is 2D scrolling beat'em up, where you play for the character, that you choose at the beginning. You have a choice of 7 characters: R-02 Zeta, Amy Rose, Rouge The Bat, Blaze The Cat, Cream The Rabbit, Miles "Tails" Prower and Zu The Cat. Your goal is to reach the end of the level. Along the way, you will meet enemies that you need to kill to reach the end of the level.

name: Worms Forts 3D
description: A turn-based artillery game for mobile phones.

name: So Below
description: Gear up, hunt, adapt, survive. Engage in a co-op survival horror experience with up to 4 players online. Explore the haunted location, find the clues and tools needed to complete the ritual and defeat the entity. Will you be able to survive?

name: That Night
description: That Night is a short PSX horror game. You're a girl in the 90's that one night decided to take a walk in a road in the middle of the forest. The more you progress, the more you hear voices of something that is following you.

name: Sofia
description:
SOFIA is a relaxing love story exploration game about love and distance.

Explore unique environments, read the letters hanging on the trees and relax in this beautiful game.

name: Truth Loop
description:
Truth Loop is a short game with a scary story and bizarre moments...

It has a "loop" style of gameplay, you keep repeating an action while the game and the story progress.

name: Half-Life: Sum
description: Half-Life: Sum takes place during and after the resonance cascade in which you play as the tough as nails HECU grunt Jane Doe as she has to wade through 11 sprawling maps. A remake of the previous released mods "HTC", "Autonomy Lost" and "Abeyance".

name: Kamisama: Spirit of the Shrine
description:
When you accidentally damage a Shinto shrine, you’re forced to pay off your debt by becoming a miko to the handsome spirits who live there—an irritable god, sly fox familiar, and energetic lion-dog guardian.

Just as you’re starting to settle into your bizarre new life, an ancient, terrifying demon awakens from his long slumber. Can you work together with your allies to repel this ancient evil, or is the town doomed to suffer the same fate it did 500 years ago?

Embark on an epic Japanese adventure to save the shrine and uncover deep secrets buried in the past. Discover and harness your spiritual power to protect your friends, all the while shaping your love story into a tale for the ages!

name: The Slasher Camp Massacre
description: A vengeful and angry killer is killing everyone in the camp, are you ready to escape? or are you ready to die?

name: On Earth as in Hell: Woytons Plague
description:
Is a ps1-style horror game set in a small, quiet town.

You are a resident, who works in the city market, and who has to go through dark and scary paths to get to your shift.

But on that day you find something strange, a mark in the back of the supermarket.

Who knows what it might mean?

name: Avenida Paulista
description: Avenida Paulista is a text-based adventure about a witch who kidnaps the brain of the director of the São Paulo Museum of Art and threatens to turn him into a goat.

name: KKuTuIO
description: KKuTuIO is a web real-time online game using Korean and English words, and there are currently more than 15 game types. Depending on the game type, you can earn points by entering the appropriate words on your turn. The participant with the highest score in the game wins.

name: Moviedle
description: A guessing game in which the player must guess an entire movie with just a 1 second long clip. Moviedle: The Movie Guessing Game has new movie to guess every day!

name: Silent Hill: The Short Message
description: Silent Hill: The Short Message is a free-to-play Silent Hill spin-off set in modern-day Germany. Players explore a location known as The Villa from a first-person perspective.

name: Full Car Mini Yontou Super Factory
description: Sin descripción

name: Detective Grimoire
description:
At 10:28 last night, a body was found at the local Fairground that operates just outside of town. The cleaner, one Jerry Spears, discovered the dead body of his former colleague, Hugh Everton, inside the Hall of Mirrors.

All the evidence points towards murder. The clown, Charles Ringer, who works at the very same fairground, is the main suspect. He seems to have some less than favourable links with the victim.

If this grim case remains unsolved, the Fairground Manager, Mr Gary Coils has stated he will have to "permanently shut down operations."

Private Detective Grimoire has been called in to clear things up. We've got one evening to find the truth about what happened last night. If Grimoire can't solve this mystery, no one can.

name: Super Smash T.V.
description: The Sega Game Gear and Master System port of Smash T.V.

name: Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo!
description: Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo! is an update available to New Leaf that was released worldwide on November 2, 2016. It introduces amiibo compatibility and various other features.

name: Smash T.V.
description: The NES port of Smash T.V.

name: Super Smash T.V.
description: The Sega Genesis port of Smash T.V.

name: Smash T.V.
description: Amiga port of Smash T.V.

name: Smash T.V.
description: Smash T.V. is a frenetic, dystopian shoot-'em-up set in a futuristic game show where violence and consumerism collide. Created by Eugene Jarvis, the mastermind behind Robotron: 2084, this game takes place in 1999 and puts players in the role of contestants fighting for survival and prizes in a series of deadly arenas. Using a unique dual-joystick control scheme, players must blast through waves of enemies, including mindless beasts and killer robots, while collecting an array of outrageous prizes ranging from toasters to luxury cars. The game's satirical take on consumer culture and media violence is underscored by its over-the-top action and gore. With its intense two-player mode, Smash T.V. offers a relentless, adrenaline-pumping experience that combines skillful shooting with dark humor, creating a cult classic in the arcade shooter genre.. This is the Commodore 64 port of Smash T.V.

name: Smash T.V.
description: The Amstrad CPC port of Smash T.V.

name: Smash T.V.
description: The Atari ST port of Smash T.V.

name: Smash T.V.
description: The ZX Spectrum port of Smash T.V.

name: ChocuPixel
description: ChocuPixel is a two dimensional platformer starring the beloved character chocu. In this adventure we must find chocus friend Juan who is lost in the basement, but we will have to fight many enemies to get to him.

name: Spiritfarer: Lily Update
description: The Lily Update is ready to spread its wings, and Lily is finally making her debut to the Spiritfarer crew! Alongside Lily herself, some new features, Quality of life changes and Bug Fixes have been added.

name: Spiritfarer: Beverly Update
description: The Beverly Update contains new features, quality of life changes and narrative tweaks. From new food items, to brand new buildings, there are lots of new content to explore!

name: Spiritfarer: Jackie & Daria Update
description: The Jackie & Daria Update adds two new characters, Jackie & Daria, as well as a brand new island to the game.

name: Vanilla: Garden of Judgement
description: "In life and death, in the paradise between those, you will know your own crime" A visual novel ADV where raw and dead intersect "Garden of the Vanilla Judgment" Circle Charon's latest work challenging straight from the theme of "life and death".

name: Vs Chat Pack
description: Vs Chat Pack is a Twitch streamer game pack. Four games in four different genres, all focused on Twitch chat interactions. Viewers play by typing various commands in the Twitch chat, and each game allows the viewers to individually impact the streamer's game experience!

name: Prima Doll: Fuyuzora Hanabi/Sekka Monyou
description: Prima Doll: Fuyuzora Hanabi/Sekka Mon'you is the first volume of a kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll that adapts the Haizakura and Karasuba prequel episode originally serialized for the official website.

name: Suspension
description:
A 10 minute game about Mark Wonnacott's final year of university.

One good ending, and one satisfying ending.

name: Prima Doll: Kouto Tantei
description: Prima Doll: Kouto Tantei is the third volume of the kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll, which is a sequel to the anime series.

name: Puck Monster
description: A Pac-Man clone by Gakken.

name: Frogger
description: A tabletop port of the Arcade game Frogger.

name: Moon Patrol
description: A handheld LCD port of Moon Patrol.

name: Dig Dug
description: A handheld port of Dig Dug by Gakken.

name: Pooyan
description: A handheld port of Pooyan.

name: Space Invader
description: A handheld clone of Space Invaders by Gakken.

name: Defender
description: A handheld clone of Defender by Gakken.

name: Super Puck Monster
description: Reskin of Coleco's Pac-Man handheld, but without the Pac-Man license (instead using Gakken's own Puck Monster character).

name: Lonely Wolf Treat: The Complete Series
description: Lonely Wolf Treat: The Complete Series is an RPG Maker game that combines the previously-episodic story of treat into one package! This project is still in development, so only 7 of the 8 chapters are available to play.

name: Prima Doll: Mumei Tenrei
description: Prima Doll: Mumei Tenrei is the second volume of the kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll. It is a prequel to the anime series focused on the character Houkiboshi.

name: Milon's Secret Castle
description: Milon, a child of the Kingdom of Hudson, must go on a quest to rescue Queen Eliza from an evil wizard who has taken over her castle as well as the musical instruments that the queen's subjects use to communicate with each other. Milon must recover the stolen instruments and rescue the queen from the wizard. Armed only with a magical bubble-shooting ability, Milon makes his way through the rooms of the castle finding items and money that can help him progress. This is a platformer that blends Mario-esqe action with puzzle-solving and exploration.

name: Kolf
description: Kolf is a miniature golf video game for Linux systems. The game is using an overhead view for it's courses that consists of various course hazards like slopes, sand traps, water and more.

name: Monika After Story
description:
Monika After Story picks up where Doki Doki Literature Club left off, allowing you to spend the rest of your days with Monika as your virtual girlfriend.

Use the new dialogue system to have conversations with Monika about subjects ranging from video games to the nature of god and existence. Or wait for a little while and she'll muse on dozens of new and interesting topics with new art and expressions not found in the original game!

name: Shinsouban Clover no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
description: Shinsouban Clover no Kuni no Alice Wonderful Wonder World is a remake of Clover no Kuni no Alice released for the PSP with new artwork by Fujimaru Mamenosuke.

name: Omochabako no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
description: Omochabako no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World is a fandisc that was released in 2011. The game was originally going to be on PC, but was instead released on the PSP. Toybox has two stories - one is a parody of Quinrose's first game, Wizard and the Master, and the other is an original story set in Wonderland. There are 26 different story arcs.

name: Spade no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Black World
description: Spade no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Black World is the ninth installment in the Heart no Kuni no Alice series. It was announced on June 1st, 2019. It is being released by Otomate. Otomate hired the original writers of the series to write this game. This game has another game tied to it called Spade no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful White World~.

name: Grimm the Bounty Hunter
description: Grimm the Bounty Hunter was an otome game released in 2012 for the PSP.

name: School Wars
description: School Wars was released in 2012 for the PSP. In 2015, it was released on the PSVita in a double pack with its fandisc called School Wars: Zenkan Pack Honpen & Sotsugyou Sensen.

name: School Wars: Sotsugyou Sensen
description: A fandisc to School Wars.

name: Gasoline Gypsies Game
description:
The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a retro 2-D action platform game. Play as Caleb, Steve, Joe, and Neal as they try to make it to the top.

As a member of the Gasoline Gypsies you will run, jump, and rock your way through various levels. Find hidden items and power-ups along the way. Use your instruments to defeat opponents. You will encounter broken strings, zombie tuners, deranged groupies, and more on your way to the stage. At the end of each level you will face off with a rival group.

Listen to 8-bit renditions of original Gasoline Gypsies music as you travel across Michigan. On your adventure you will unlock levels, costumes, mini games and more. Compete for dominance on the online leaderboard or team up with a friend for local co-op. The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a colorful non violent game intended for all ages.

name: The Evil Within: Season Pass
description: The Season Pass is a DLC for The Evil Within. It includes three add-on packs: The Assignment; The Consequence, which revolve around Juli Kidman; and The Executioner, where you play as The Keeper.

name: There's Nobody
description: A short horror movie in a psx style game. A woman in a simple hotel is bothered by the noise coming from the neighbor, but is anyone there?

name: #Doubleblush
description: By squishymoss and violet lafleur. Girl meets girl and shit gets #gay

name: Wild Hearts
description: Prepare for an epic adventure set in a fantasy world inspired by feudal Japan. Developed by Omega Force, the Japanese studio behind Dynasty Warriors, in partnership with Electronic Arts.

name: Hero's Harem Guild
description: In Hero's Harem Guild you're a simple poor guy who becomes a community hero for accidentally surviving a powerful demon. You'll lead a Guild full of beautiful adventurers willing to work, train, and fight for you. Upgrade the Guild, repair the town, seek new members, build relationships with those that already are and complete quests in this RPG-themed world.

name: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
description: Die Hard 2: Die Harder is a cancelled Sega Master System game based on the movie of the same name. The game was developed by Tiertex and meant to be published by Grandslam in December 1991, however after not meeting the release cycle it was "indefinitely postponed" in mid-1992 because Sega had concerns with the quality of the game.

name: Austin Powers: Mojo Rally
description: Austin Powers: Mojo Rally is a cancelled racing game for the Sega Dreamcast based on the Austin Powers movie series.

name: Wild Water Adrenaline featuring Salomon
description:
Wild Water Adrenaline is a game based on whitewater kayaking and rafting. Up to four players, in single kayaks or controlling a raft together, can play simultaneously to go down rivers, conquer rapids and drop off cliffs. The player especially needs to pay attention to the steering, which is controlled through the analogue sticks, one for each of the character's arms, to avoid a variety of obstacles. This is done by constantly moving them in a circular motion.

Next to the main game modes, there is also a training to explore the course and get used to the handling. The game is endorsed and has been developed in collaboration with Salomon, a manufacturer of articles for outdoor sports.

name: Centipede
description: The Game Boy Color port of the Centipede remake.

name: Pokémon Realidea System
description: Pokémon Realidea System is a fanmade Pokémon game with fakemon starters and a new legendary mon. A few regional forms, new characters, new quests, 8 Gym Badges to get and of course a Pokémon League and plenty more!

name: Kaikiken
description: Kaikiken is a short visual novel included in FromSoftware's Adventure Player for the Playstation Portable.

name: Hako no Naka
description: Hako no Naka is a short adventure game included in FromSoftware's Adventure Player for the Playstation Portable.

name: Centipede
description: Atari 2600 port of Centipede.

name: Centipede
description: Atari 5200 port of Centipede.

name: Parlor
description: Parlor is an interactive party game that can be played with your Twitch chat! Each round you give clues to your chat and they try to guess the answer by typing it to your chat, competing with each other.

name: Centipede
description: The Atari 7800 port of Centipede.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the ColecoVision.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the Commodore 64.

name: Cursor0x0
description: Cursor0x0 is a collection of various cursor mini games that require a good reaction, stamina, and precision. Fight enemies, win races, dodge bullets, complete different goals to unlock new challenge types and reach the final level!

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the Intellivision.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for IBM PC (DOS).

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the Texas Instruments TI-99/4A.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the Commodore VIC-20.

name: Centipede
description: Port of the original Centipede Arcade for Windows.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the Apple II computer.

name: Centipede
description: Port of Centipede for the BBC Micro computer.

name: Centipede
description: Remaster of Centipede for iOS.

name: Pretty x Cation
description: Sin descripción

name: Reflex Runner
description: Reflex Runner is a speed running platformer that increases in difficulty as you progress through close to 40 unique levels. clear each level as fast as possible dodging razor sharp saw blades, red hot lasers, shooting flames and more as you race to set world record clear times!

name: Prima Doll Encore
description: Prima Doll Encore is the fourth and final volume of a kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll, depicting the aftermath of the Kuronekotei café.

name: Battle Baseball
description: Battle Baseball is a Japan-only baseball video game developed by Vic Tokai and published by Banpresto for the Famicom on February 19, 1993. A part of the collaborative "Compati Sports Series" (コンパチスポーツシリーズ Konpachi Supōtsu Shirīzu) in the Compati Hero series, it crosses over characters from several popular Japanese franchises, including Godzilla, Ultraman, Kamen Rider and Gundam.

name: Battle Dodge Ball II
description: Battle Dodge Ball II is a crossover video game in the Compati Hero series and a sequel to Battle Dodge Ball.

name: Battle Formation
description: Battle Formation was a strategy game for the PlayStation that used villains from the Ultraman, Gundam, and Kamen Rider franchises as playable characters. The player would use mobile suits, kaijin, and Kaiju from various entries of each franchise to conquer an island until they encountered the final boss simply known as Keeper.

name: The Way Back Home: Sinister Night
description:
This is a short horror game with some elements of exhibition
The focus is on a horror-like atmosphere, so there are no jump scares.
The game has multiple endings.

name: Fight Over Dat Ancient
description: An opensource card game with magical heroes, each with unique skills and powerful abilities.

name: Tomb Raider
description: The N-Gage port of Tomb Raider is a 3D game closely modeled after 1997's Tomb Raider II on PlayStation. Rather than feature a side-scrolling perspective as in previous handheld efforts, Tomb Raider maintains the console and computer's third-person perspective from behind globetrotting archaeologist Lara Croft. While navigating the 3D worlds in an attempt to recover a relic known as the Scion, players can run, jump, climb, shimmy across ledges, and perform various other acrobatic maneuvers. Along the way the intrepid explorer must defend herself from hungry wolves and rival treasure hunters using her trademark dual pistols or an assortment of other weapons found during her journey.

name: Alcatraz: A Fuga Impossível
description: Alcatraz: A Fuga Impossível is a text-based adventure where you need to escape from the famous prison Alcatraz.

name: Untold Atlas
description:
Riya Cross is sent on an expedition to explore Aethra, a mysterious island which was once a beacon of ancient technology before being lost to the depths of the sea, then resurfaced back into the world.

Led by Captain Felix Harker, Riya and the rest of her crew which includes loose cannon Eli Ryder, the accomplished Lilith Wren, the contracted scientist Alexei Nova, and the ever-pleasant Aethran guide Claris Io to embark into the mysteries of Aethra and all its regions as they grow closer to the answers behind the true source of the island’s ancient technology while diving into their own adventures and romances along the way.

name: Crypt
description: This is not a video game. This is a psychological torture device. Do not attempt to play this game. You won't have an enjoyable experience. And that's intentional.

name: Petty's Adventure: Desert
description: Petty's Adventure: Desert is a colorful game with changing gravity in which you have collect crystals to complete a level.

name: Air Splitter
description: The racing game where you don't steer your car! It's all about how you handle your speed in this frantic racing game!

name: Witch Guild Survivor
description: Witch Guild Survivor is a fun horde roguelite game where you play as a witch that must survive from the monsters using your poweful spells! Collect white orbs and upgrade your magic spells. Choose a combination of various elements to generate synergies between them in each run

name: Neon Mine
description: A logic puzzle game - classic minesweeper with a modern twist.

name: Valor & Victory: Arnhem
description: Arnhem Sunday 17th September. Lt-Col John Frost's 2nd Battalion, The Parachute Regiment, reach Arnhem Bridge little knowing the fierce battles they would be fighting over the next few days.

name: Warsaken
description: A modern military-themed deck construction game in which you can battle other players.

name: Nerf Legends: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunless Sea: Zubmariner Edition
description: Take the helm of your steamship and set sail for the unknown!

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - Gold Edition
description: The Greatest Show on Dirt makes its video game return!

name: Grin Robot Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Undertale Last Breath
description: Undertale Last Breath (aka. Undertale Final Breath) is an AU fangame where after 30 genocide routes Frisk reached the 31st genocide, Frisk found a strange door, and found a strange figure who then left, sending Frisk unconscious. The strange figure informed Sans the skeleton of the past genocide routes, agitating sans to the point that he swears to kill the human, no matter the cost.

name: Haunted Castle II
description: Fight Dracula in his castle. Cross 10 Levels of terror starting from the Camilla Cemetery.

name: My Little Idol
description: My Little Idol is an AI-based dating simulation game.

name: Cardseer
description: Cardseer is a fantasy deckbuilding game combining old school RPGs like the original Final Fantasy's with card games Yugioh, Hearthstone and Gwent. features a story based campaign, taking you across the continent to stop a mysterious evil force, and a challenging roguelike Gauntlet mode. Engage in fast paced card combat against a horde of villains, carefully traverse the hazardous map and strategically collect game-changing artifacts to emerge victorious!

name: Bitejacker
description: Bitejacker is a zombie shooter based on the indie game review show, Bytejacker. Player can play as the host, Anthony Carboni, or cameraman, Jon Rivera as they brave through a bizarre world of zombie apocalypse.

name: World Flight
description:
Fly around the world without limits with your Meta Quest 2 headset.
Feel the freedom, travel anywhere in the planet and enjoy all its beauty and diversity.
Plan your flight on the map with a powerful search engine and fly a plane or a helicopter with totally different gameplays.

name: Shrimp Magicality
description:
Shrimp Magicality is an adventure game that is focused on exploration. You play as ‘The Professor,’ a narcoleptic academic, wandering around a fictionalized Seattle. Experience her wildest dreams, as she dozes off throughout The Ave.

Meet quirky characters, discover a colorful world, and try to get some rest.

name: Samurai Unicorn
description: An action horror game with retro-graphics, set in the sprawling megacity of Sydney3.

name: Mouse Sector
description:
A small constellation full of mysteries

"earth is so far away now ... "

name: Farm & Survive Bundle
description: A bundle of Mr. Prepper and Farm Manager 2022.

name: Hobby Simulator Bundle
description: A bundle of Rover Mechanic Simulator, Train Station Renovation, and Car Mechanic Simulator Classic

name: Dig Dug
description: Dig Dug is a 1-2 player arcade game in which you have to use your shovel to dig your way through the earth. Stopping you from doing this are two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, who will continually chase you around. The only weapon that you carry is an air pump, which you can use to inflate the monsters to the point where they explode. (if you start to inflate them but stop doing so, the monsters will get turned back to their normal selves). Furthermore, rocks are scattered throughout the earth, and you can use these rocks to squash them. If the monsters do not find you for several seconds, they will eventually get turned into ghosts, which can walk through the earth. They are invincible and cannot be killed. From time to time, vegetables will appear in the center, and you can get these for points.

name: Dig Dug
description: Port of Dig Dug for Atari 8-bit computers. There are two versions for these computers, and this is the version released in 1982.
